request.title: System Security Feature Schema
request.description: System profile Security feature schema for request

rekey.description: Set how often to change the AES key for DTLS connections

replayWindow.description: Set the sliding replay window size

integrityType.description: Set the authentication type for DTLS connections

name.description: Specify the name of the Keychain

documentation.description: This is the documentation for request schema for System profile Security feature
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
